xwikidoc.name: PCTestDeplymentConfiguration
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Test Deplyment Configuration
xwikidoc.content:
{{velocity}} $xwiki.jsx.use('PhenomeCentral.PCTestDeplymentConfiguration')## $xwiki.ssx.use('PhenoTips.TabelarDataMacros')## ## #set ($serverList = $services.pcTestDeployment.listServers()) #set ($message = '') #set ($usage = $serverList.get('usage')) #set ($cpuLeft = $usage.get('maxTotalCores') - $usage.get('totalCoresUsed')) #if ($cpuLeft < $usage.get('requiredCores')) #set ($message = "less than $usage.get('requiredCores') virtual CPUs are free") #end #set ($ramLeft = $usage.get('maxTotalRAMSize') - $usage.get('totalRAMUsed')) #if ($ramLeft < $usage.get('requiredRAM')) #if ($message != '')#set ($message = $message + ", ")#end #set ($message = $message + "less than $usage.get('requiredRAM')GB of free RAM") #end #set ($instLeft = $usage.get('maxTotalInstances') - $usage.get('totalInstancesUsed')) #if ($instLeft == 0) #if ($message != '')#set ($message = $message + ", ")#end #set ($message = $message + "reached the maximum allowed number of running instances") #end #set ($canRunInst = $mathtool.min($instLeft, $mathtool.idiv($ramLeft,8), $mathtool.idiv($cpuLeft,2))) #set ($discard = $usage.put("spaceForInst", $canRunInst)) ## ## {{html}}
Please, select project and corresponding branches for test build deployment.
##
##
#if ($message != '')
There is not enough OpenStack resources for starting a new instance: $message.

To alocate more space please delete some unused running servers.
#else
OpenStack has resources for $canRunInst more instances.
#end
VCPUs
Used $usage.get('totalCoresUsed') of $usage.get('maxTotalCores')
RAM
Used $usage.get('totalRAMUsed')GB of $usage.get('maxTotalRAMSize')GB
Instances
Used $usage.get('totalInstancesUsed') of $usage.get('maxTotalInstances')
{{/html}} ## ## == Running test servers == #set ($serverList = $serverList.get('servers')) ## TABLE HEADER #set ($headerNames = ['Server Name', 'Branches', 'IP', 'Started Time', 'Load test data', 'Status', 'Logs', 'Action']) (% class="extradata-list server-list-row" %) #foreach($headerName in $headerNames) |=(% class="col-label" %)$headerName## #end ## TABLE BODY #set ($datasetList = $services.pcTestDeployment.listTestDatasets()) #foreach ($obj in $serverList) #set($beginTime = $obj.get('created').replace('T',' ').replace('Z','')) #set($pn = $obj.get('metadata').optString('pn')) #set($rm = $obj.get('metadata').optString('rm')) #set($pc = $obj.get('metadata').optString('pc')) #set($pt = $obj.get('metadata').optString('pt')) #set($pr = $obj.get('metadata').optString('pr')) (% class="extradata-list server-list-row" %)## |(% class="server-name" %)$escapetool.xml($obj.get('name'))## |(% class="branches" %){{html clean="false"}}#if("${pr}" == "PhenomeCentral")## #if("${pn}" != "")PN: $pn#end## #if("${rm}" != ""), RM: $rm#end## #if("${pc}" != ""), PC: $pc#end## #else## #if("${pt}" != "")PT: $pt#end## #end{{/html}}## |(% class="ip" %){{html clean="false"}}$escapetool.xml($obj.get('ip')){{/html}}## |(% class="begin-time" %)$!{beginTime}## |(% class="load-test-data" %)#if($obj.get('status') == "active"){{html clean="false"}}## ## Load{{/html}}#end## |(% class="run-status $completedCSS" %)$obj.get('status')## |(% class="logs" %)#if($obj.get('status') == "active"){{html clean="false"}}instance log
deploy log{{/html}}#end## |(% class="action-delete" %){{html clean="false"}} Delete{{/html}} #end Last deployment {{html clean="false"}}log{{/html}} Last data upload {{html clean="false"}}log{{/html}} Frontend (this) server {{html clean="false"}}log{{/html}} {{/velocity}}
